website_summaries.verdict: This fully assembled weed torch is a great, affordable option that lets you get to work right away.
pros: A no-frills model that is lightweight and easy to use, making it a good option for home use and small jobs
With an output of 24,000 BTUs, this is a reliable choice for small weeds or melting a thin layer of ice
cons: Some customers found the self-lighting mechanism unreliable

customer_reviews.title: Who knew weeding could be fun?
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's so much fun to watch those nasty weeds burn like they are in the fiery depths of Hell to which they belong. Not having to use toxic chemicals is a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: gotmybagspacked

customer_reviews.title: Flame King Torch is junk
customer_reviews.text: I received my Flame King torch yesterday and it doesn't work. The lighter mechanism won't ignite the propane so its completely worthless. I called the manufacturer and got no response. Buy some other brand and avoid the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I only used it three times before the tip fell off which in my opinion is the wrong tip for it the flame isn't big enough or strong enough to really knock the weeds out so a slow walk is a really slow walk so grab a chair! I also couldnt find any tips at all for this thing . They should offer at the very least replacment tips and a variety of them depending on what your using it for .
customer_reviews.author: Larry H. Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical I’m buying this, but I’m sure glad I did it works as advertised the igniter works at throws a great flame very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Timmer

customer_reviews.title: It Works....Slowly
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of compacted decomposed granite in our yard and use the torch to catch weeds as they emerge. It's fun, but oh so slow. A weed an inch across may take 30 seconds to burn to ash. A weed two inches across maybe 90 seconds. I've found that I'm better off just scuffing the tops of the weeds off of the roots with my shoe as they emerge. If you seriously need a propane torch I'd suggest getting one that connects to a large propane tank. That's what our city crews use. They put out 20 times the heat and can seriously take down weeds along the sidewalk, etc.
customer_reviews.author: R3C

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality and ease of use of this torch. It worked on the first try and even comes with legible written English instructions in the manual, should you need them. I know I'll be able to use this for many applications, and highly recommend it to anyone that can safely operate it.
customer_reviews.author: Markooley

customer_reviews.title: One of the best camping tools you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! Just finishes my first camping trip. Usually you have to do prep work to start a fire. With this thing you have the fire rawring on its own in about 1 minute. I would recommend this to anyone!!! Those people who say the starter doesnt work probably have the gas at full throttle. Back it to low to start it, then open it up.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Garcia

customer_reviews.title: OMG this is so fun!  Who thought weeding could be fun.
customer_reviews.text: Nearly lit the house on fire a couple of times but it was worth it. Keep a hose handy! Don't use it inside the house. Don't walk away until you're positive everything is out. I prefer night time use. Flame comes out about 6-8". Tim "The Toolman" Taylor would be proud!
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Flame “joke”
customer_reviews.text: Update: I returned. As Smazon says, refund will be issued in 7 days. But I have received my refund after 2 weeks!!!! I disputed with my CC issuer!! I got a replacement because the lighter failed after the first use. Then........the replacement’s lighter never worked!!! What a joke!!! In addition, the fire quenched after like 5 mins with no reason; my tank is full.
customer_reviews.author: S. N.

customer_reviews.title: This works!  Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is as good as those much more expensive. Works well. Those who have complained about it blowing out probably didn’t read the book that came with it. When the gas cylinder is too cold because of either high flame setting or lengthy use, it will go off. Solution is to use low flame and break up big jobs. I am more than thrilled at how this works on weeds.
customer_reviews.author: CSM

customer_reviews.title: Just what my son needed to eradicate the weeds from the rocks around his property.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to burn weeds. WARNING: this is hot - it is FIRE - don't use on weeds that are surrounded by anything that will burn/lead to burning your home down. Seriously, folks - be safe. That said, it works perfectly on weeds growing in sidewalk/concrete cracks, street cracks, stone yards, dirt, etc. Does NOT work well to melt iced sidewalks. Be smart.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Propane Torch Weed Burner
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product. I am 6', holding it close enough to weed requires bending a little as the shaft is not adjustable. The ignitor works fine you just have to use keeping the angle and valve just barely open. Works great on my gravel drive, just don't use it where it might start a yard fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars for easy to use because I couldn't get the ignition to work and found no instructions in the box or on the device. Otherwise, I absolutely love it. I have been getting weaker in my "golden" years and was looking for something to get rid of the weeds without chemicals, worked well, and wasn't too heavy. This does the trick. It may be a little time consuming for a double lot like ours, but it is worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Thalia S

customer_reviews.title: Best weeding tool available!
customer_reviews.text: Great torch. Kills my weeds with fire, which is something I’ve been wanting to do for a very long time. I put this in the hands of my 19 year old son and sent my 15 year old son to follow him with a fire extinguisher, and they had the time of their lives doing my yard work for me. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burns the weeds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to avoid using herbicides on my fence lines. We have a dog that sometimes grazes on the long grass blades found growing in the protection of the fence. Poison and pets don't mix well. The device works well! The only issue I have with it is that unless the flame end is already hot the spark type igniter does not work. For lighting the flame when the unit is cold you will need a torch starter. Also, it works very well on grass blades, but not on broadleaf weeds. They seem almost unfazed and heal quickly. Be careful not to burn anything down.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on the stupid weeds in the cracks of my drive way and side yard. Has a good lighter mechanism that works great, it is pretty light and balance is pretty darn good with the propane bottle attached. I've actually used it as a lighter for my grill as well when the wind kept blowing out my coals. Worked fantastic for that as well. I would definitely buy one of these again mainly for the fact that it is very fun to use. Love seeing the pesky weeds crumble and smolder when I swing this thing over them. Very rewarding.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap igniter
customer_reviews.text: Does not light half the time have to use a lighter to light it.
customer_reviews.author: joey wynne

customer_reviews.title: Fails to ignite about 50% of the time
customer_reviews.text: After years of use my trusty Bernzomatic 19425 finally died and I tried replacing it with this one. Unfortunately the ignitor on the Flame King is much less reliable - I usually have to click it several times to get ignition, sometimes it sticks and is hard to get to click at all. Definitely not as good as the Bernzomatic.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not so much a torch
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something like a flame from a Bernzomatic hand touch, but its more of an open flame. I used it to burn some dead grass stuck in my fence, it didn't seem to do much to live grass.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos H. Ortiz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The spark lighter is poor
customer_reviews.text: The lighter works, but it does take some fiddling to get the gas to light. I find it easier to bring a grill igniter with me to light it. The propane canisters screw right on and the flame is well controlled and well directed. I have to practice some more to figure out the best technique to burn the targeted weeds just enough to kill them without turning the whole thing into ash and wasting a lot of time and fuel. I'm also unsure if it would be better to do the weed killing when wet or dry?
customer_reviews.author: I. Brasslett

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: UPdATED this thing sucks the lighter part already broke so we have to light with a lighter. Can be hard to keep lit has a hole on the side that leaks a lot of propne
customer_reviews.author: Holly F

customer_reviews.title: Great for burning weeds/grass in driveway.
customer_reviews.text: I have a partial gravel driveway, that over the years weeds and grass have grown into. This propane weed burner torch works great, and was just what I needed! Easy to use, the self-ignitor made it easy to light. You don't need to have a very big flame to take care of the weeds. Easy on the back, I didn't feel like I had to bend over at all. Perfect for around the home use. I use it for the weeds between my patio pavers, too.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: does a good job
customer_reviews.text: does a good job for small weeds, I have a big torch burner but was tired of dragging around the big propane tank. This takes quit a bit longer but is very easy to use, the auto starter is a little hit and miss but no big deal to ignite it with a regular lighter. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Burton

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: What a fun toy! I looked at several different versions of this and this was by far the best price and value. The auto ignition feature works great, and the unit itself is surprisingly sturdy and of good construction. Definitely recommend for killing weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Paelana

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just used for the first time this morning. I loved killing those pesky weeds that grow through any small crevice in the cement. We have river stone in our flower beds, and its difficult to get the weeds out with the roots. This baby burns them down! Also nice that ypu can stand and kill them. Be careful if you have leafs, wood, dry grass etc, because this will set them afire!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Turner

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: They must have fixed the electronic igniter issue. I did not have any issues using the igniter to generate flame. Burns hot! 24,000 BTU. Melts weeds! Be careful- will ignite leaves and melt drip irrigation lines! For the price, I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Hardware Guy

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Needed solution to stone dog yard with constant weeds growing thru near my well not wanting to use pesticides since I have difficulty bending over pulling weeds
customer_reviews.author: Marie Pletsch

customer_reviews.title: Works, if you've got lots of time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for weed control. It works...if you've got a lot of time on your hands. You have to spend much more time than you'd think to burn them. The flame isn't very large or powerful, so you spend a lot of time burning a small portion of weeds at a time. It's takes me a few hours, at least, to do the garden...and it's a small garden.
customer_reviews.author: Lane G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in gravel
customer_reviews.text: I live in the desert Southwest. My yard is landscaped mostly with gravel. I have tried several means of weed extraction; they required bending over and were tiring and not very effective. I have used the weed burner several times and it works great. I recommended it to my neighbors who have the same type of landscaping. We do not have to worry about starting brush on fire. Saves my back.
customer_reviews.author: C R Cannady

customer_reviews.title: Great way to deal with small weeds!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great tool for dealing with emerging weeds in my gravel pathways without using chemicals. Easy to use and comfortable to handle for an hour at a time. I’m amazed at how long a bottle of propane will go! My only beef is that the igniter doesn’t always work and I have to use a hand-held igniter to light it.
customer_reviews.author: KitV

customer_reviews.title: Works good 1 or 2 times
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for like 1 or 2 times. Now the fire starter doesn’t work. Have to light the end with a lighter every time.
customer_reviews.author: ITAG

customer_reviews.title: Great product. All metal and cranks out the fire!
customer_reviews.text: This did exactly what I purchased it for. It screws on to a 1 lb propane tank and lights with the turn of the knob and push of the igniter. The flame is adjustable with the knob and it puts out a lot of heat. I would reccomend buying an adapter to refill the 1 lb tank from a 20 lb tank as it would be cheaper than buying many small tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we need.
customer_reviews.text: After the first use, the ignitor no longer worked. In order to use it, we turn on the gas & light it. This is our replacement of spraying chemicals on our weeds and it works great for that. I was hoping to reach out to the seller to see if the ignitor can be replaced?
customer_reviews.author: What I want

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit starter
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got this at the price I paid. We use it for our backyard fire pit. Makes starting a fire SOOOO much more convenient. I bought two of the small Coleman propane tanks for $6. I'm still on the first one and I've used the torch probably 12 times now. It starts every time. If yours isn't starting, your propane flow is too high. Back it down and it'll start.
customer_reviews.author: D. Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Auto light doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Have to light it with a match. seems to work ok after it's lit. Also seems to loose propane out of the air holes at the top.
customer_reviews.author: StevenSader

customer_reviews.title: could just be a defective one, Ordering another
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use this igniter lit once , it burned very well. Turned off headed to a second area, tried to reignite and would NOT start, keep trying and trying. I hope it was just a defective unit. I will reorder and try again. Felt very nice and easy to use. HOPE this NEW one will work GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Carver

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this product but it doesn’t seem to burn weeds and less they’re completely dry I end up just pulling the weeds anyway I use this for dry weeds but just be careful you are dealing with an open flame and if it’s dry out you could definitely do damage. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Works well but I'm going back to round-up.
customer_reviews.text: It works well for burning the weeds without chemicals, however it takes quite a lot longer and propane cylinders are rather pricey. Also the weeds returned only a few weeks where as chemicals are quicker to apply and last longer. If you are totally opposed to the chemicals this will work for you, butni you have a large area to treat you may want a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Rod S.

customer_reviews.title: A torch is all you need
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great. No more kneeling down on concrete patio with our aging bodies. Save our backs and knees and hands and most importantly, time. Its been weeks and no weeds!! Hubby enjoys burning stuff with a torch very much. Time to throw out all the weed spray and tools.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie Chen

customer_reviews.title: Component failed
customer_reviews.text: These lighters are not worth the head ache. I bought seven for company employees to use. The problem is not the gas. The igniter failed on all seven. You get what you pay for. Bernzomatic is the better choice and worth the extra bit of cash.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Hard to imagine a better weed burner
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yet sturdy, easy to use, seems to last a long time on each canister of propane. I use it to knock back weeds on gravel walkways, and for this the flame size seems perfectly adequate.
customer_reviews.author: John Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought the more powerful Flame King model, and I'm really glad I didn't. This one puts out more than enough heat to burn the grass and weeds out of the cracks and crevices in my driveway and brick patio, even at the lowest gas flow rate -- which is, incidentally, where you want to set it to start; a faster gas flow will keep it from lighting. Excellent product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Carver

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to buy this?!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item yesterday and I have already done so much with it! I have a huge flower bed that I have neglected for a few years and the weeds have overtaken it. I managed to clear out about half the bed in just a few hours. I don’t know why I wanted so long to get one. It’s a lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little torch.
customer_reviews.text: Received in a speedy manner comparing to Amazon Pandemic time. I did receive this item and have used it a few times. Does what I want and is easy for me to use. Stricker on this item works a little more than half the time. Keep a lighter (or whatever you would use) in your pocket just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Stannabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a flame thrower for my 20lb tank and was very difficult to move around. Had a lot of fire power, but not very nimble. This 1lb flame thrower is great for maneuverability. Works great and throws a nice flame. Will be buying another one when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom and Jody  Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Igniter worked 1time the first time I tried it. Tried to use it the next day and had to light it manually.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of the US brand
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be the same item as the burnsamatic unit at half the price. Kinda a waste of fuel and time to hit the little weeds in my beds; faster to bend over and pull them out but it's more fun. Works great as a starter for your fire pit though.
customer_reviews.author: bfreidah

customer_reviews.title: This torch does what it's supposed to do...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the overall product. Easy to use, built in igniter fires it up immediately, adjustable flame is excellent, much quicker than hand weeding. Use it primarily for a large gravel driveway- very happy to get away from chemical weed killers- also excellent for starting fires in firepit. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A Clouse

customer_reviews.title: Campfire’s Quick!!
customer_reviews.text: For lighting campfires this this rocks. In my ‘younger’ days, struggling with kindling and teepee stacking was actually fun - but not anymore. I just want to light the fire and enjoy it - and die that purpose this item exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: A real tool for controlling weeds in your garden or driveways. It can develop plenty of flame. BE CAREFUL. Start it with a low gas flow. Watch where you are pointing it. Getting distracted will get you or something else a burn.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great value ...you need something to light it
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall... easy to use and balanced in your hand. Wish I had bought one years ago that’s for sure. There are a couple issues... the ignition button does not work and looks like it was never Seriously designed to. I wish they sold or included an adapter to use the smaller propane bottles. This would reduce they carry weight and give you more fuel options. Overall for the price it’s a good value. Make sure you have something to light it with.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Don't need full blast to light.
customer_reviews.text: I was getting ready to return it because it wouldn't light. Then I tried it one more time and realized that on full blast, the igniter wouldn't work. Only needs a slight trickle to get it lit with the self ignition button, then can adjust from there.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good weed burner
customer_reviews.text: For the price this has been a good product to burn our weeds. It has not clogged and as long as you don't turn it up, it functions properly. If it's on full blast, it blows the flame out. But that's no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Norsky

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptical about whether or not this would work, but I was tired of poisoning the environment with weed killer. Got it last week and used over the weekend. Fantastic product so far! The key will be whether or not the weeds come back soon. I even used it in a mulched bed to burn some weeds and vines before they got established. It may catch some mulch on fire but it usually goes right out when you move the flame away. If not, just stomp on it. The lighter has to cool off between use and relighting so just give it a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence ordering this unit and was considering ordering a unit for a 5 gal tank with hose, however, I am glad I purchased the smaller, lighter unit. The integrated electric starter is a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W.

customer_reviews.title: Works well once you find a way to light it
customer_reviews.text: Works well however the start button failed after the first use. I guessed that the flint fill out however no instructions on how to replace flint. I am using a striker that my husband uses to light a torch. It’s a long reach to the end of the pipe so it’s a bit difficult to light it this way
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the best one you can buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice torch for lighting fires in burning weeds did not have any trouble with the ignition on it and a lot of people talk about the other ones melding off this is basically Solid Steel not aluminum
customer_reviews.author: randy.glacken

customer_reviews.title: Finding more uses for it
customer_reviews.text: I have started using it to start the charcoal chimney for grilling and bonfires in the yard in addition to its intended purpose. For the money you cant go wrong. A one pound can of propane lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: john g hubert

customer_reviews.title: Works Exactly As Described
customer_reviews.text: So I've seen a bunch of uses for these. I bought it so I could melt crack stix into my driveway cracks. I also use it to start fires in the fire pit and to get the kamado going.
customer_reviews.author: r3vi3ws4u

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lot of fun. Somebody wrote the striker dosn't work. Yeah it does. Turn on tiny bit to light it like you would an acetylene torch. Also turn it upside down to make a huge flame.
customer_reviews.author: Lumpyrlr

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you will not be sorry
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have item in our camper. The wife had since kicked me off from fire making duties so she can use this to lite them. Easy to use and works great and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn J

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for lighting the firepit and fireplace. Construction is heavier and more durable than I had expected. Price and product were better than comparable products that I saw at my local DIY store. Definitely a good buy. If you're looking for an extension fire starter or weed burner... buy it. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Maples

customer_reviews.title: No start
customer_reviews.text: The igniter did not work out of the box. I suppose I could have return it. But was able to light it with a long lighter. Other than that, excellent build quality. Chrome still look new after a few use. Flame control was also precise and felt good adjusting it. Did the job in removing weeds on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wang

customer_reviews.title: Learn how to ignite it!
customer_reviews.text: The product works well but initially I had a lot of difficulty lighting it......to the extent that I was ready to return it as defective. However, I first opted to contact the company and learned that the trick is to turn the valve on VERY SLIGHTLY.....barely open......before igniting, and then, once lit, turning the valve on further to increase the flame/heat. Once you learn that, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P.

customer_reviews.title: Can run hot.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it a four instead of a five is because when it runs for a while, it gets hot and then just shuts off. You have to stop and wait for it to cool down and then start over. Other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Roth

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ! I used it to evaporate oil that was deeply soaked into my carport concrete from the previous owners laziness. Its also very useful to start a fire in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Jay s

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to have
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done. The flame isn’t huge but just enough to burn small weeds in concrete. We tried using it to light the grill but it doesn’t really have enough power for that.
customer_reviews.author: Liv Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple, sturdy tool.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and well made.watch weeds! Be wise use manufactor's info on use.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great charcoal starter!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for charcoal and campfires! Just don't turn it too high when starting or it won't light and cool the end with water after using.
customer_reviews.author: David Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Very easy to use. On max setting it is like a mini flame thrower. Great for starting a firepit, bbq, and getting rid of weeds.
customer_reviews.author: David Hassall

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use for me
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to use as I hoped for. I struggled to light it and keep it lit to burn weeds. The tank I bought for it was not able to be filled. It seems to go through the tank of gas from Home Depot quite quickly. I think there is a learning curve and I will keep trying as it’s a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Janet H D'Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use product. Flame is pretty strong. I definitely suggest using gloves with it. I was able to burn most of the weeds in half an hour. Very efficient on propane use. I wouldn’t say I even used a quarter of a tank in one session
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Automatic integrated lighter useless
customer_reviews.text: First one we purchased, we returned as the integrated lighter didn’t work. You can see a small spark,but doesn’t ignite. Replacement did the same. We kept 2nd one and just ignite with lighter.
customer_reviews.author: marianne rambo

customer_reviews.title: Well made quality item does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job burning out weeds growing between the bricks on my patio. Much preferred over spraying my deck with herbicide. Well-built, starts easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Spangenberg

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PROPANE WEED BURNER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously though, how much can you write such a simple product? The item(s) is/are well made, with good fit, finish, and quality
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: What a great torch for keeping weeds easily under control. We love this torch. It ignites easily, is lightweight and we keep it within easy reach for use. I highly recommend using this torch to keep weeds at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Doren

customer_reviews.title: Igniter does not work
customer_reviews.text: Igniter does not work, got an exchange and the replacement still does not work. I kept it since the next similar brand was 10-20 bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: Fminus

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm not great..
customer_reviews.text: Igniter broke after the first usage. Have to ignite with a lighter now. Kinda dangerous.. so if you enjoy Danger.. Get This Now!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Primalmate

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far it is a much better way to deal with weeds. Best used if used on very young sprouts as maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: agbif

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this. I have 4 dogs and I cannot use weed killer. This does a great job on getting rid of the weeds.
customer_reviews.author: The Hamiltonian

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: If your looking to burn some weeds this is cheap and it works !!! Just be careful around your fence or any other flammable objects !! I’ve had someone follow me with a hose as I burn !! Love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Torch.
customer_reviews.text: Nice.Lights up everytime and easy to carry. Great for barrel burns. Use it with my Bad Idea incinerator.
customer_reviews.author: Mysticknight

customer_reviews.title: Burns me up
customer_reviews.text: Not in a good way: the ignitor died after 1 days of yard work burning weeds. Can't recommend it -
customer_reviews.author: Shop Smart

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Have a large weed burner for bigger jobs, this one does great for spot/weed control
customer_reviews.author: AbCritter

customer_reviews.title: Auto ignition button works great
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well, lightweight, great balance with the cylinder attached..auto ignite switch is a plus..
customer_reviews.author: John Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy igniter
customer_reviews.text: The igniter broke after only a couple of uses, it's in a strange spot. Too late to return, but it still lights fine with a lighter. Love the reach.
customer_reviews.author: mp6003

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and lightweight. After many years of trying (and failing) to get rid of the weeds and grass growing in my driveway I thought I'd give this a try. It worked great. I plan to use it to start my bonfire tomorrow 👍
customer_reviews.author: Born2Travel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product and sold at a good price. No more bending over to start a fire!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It’s affordable, works great, and it’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rambeau

customer_reviews.title: Igniter does not work look for a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this the igniter does not work I have to manually light it with a exterior lighter. Igniter seems to be cheaply made as it pushes in and gets stuck and I have to manually pull it back out May just return and buy a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Alford Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Use it solely to light my lump charcoal. Best way to light by far. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Wesley BoothTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Portable Weed burner
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight and easily manageable to use. It has a smaller flame tip than the larger commercial size wand. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Flatlander

customer_reviews.title: LIghts every time. Torches are often difficult to ignite.
customer_reviews.text: Lights reliably. Easy to hold. Used for burning sprouting weeds. I don't like to use chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Can produce about to a 2' flame!
customer_reviews.text: It can produce a much bigger flame than I expected. Lots of uses from burning weeds to starting a fire. Update, the second time using it, the button and spring inside the attached igniter fell out. I'll probably be able to get another universal one. Still a nice torch.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: haven't used it yet!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, can't wait to try it out but must get 1 lb propane bottle first!
customer_reviews.author: faye bentley

customer_reviews.title: CAMPFIRE Starter
customer_reviews.text: I loved my torch, but this is so much better and faster to light a campfire.....
customer_reviews.author: David A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A plus.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for starting bonfires. Wonderful for burning sandbars. Nice comfortable handle and easy to start
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: This badboy rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Big firepower. Easy to use. The starter did not work at all but we had a lighter.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service- I had a problem and they were great!
customer_reviews.text: I have difficulty with the way to light it- with a striker just me.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN LANE

customer_reviews.title: NOT a weed burner. Too week.
customer_reviews.text: Very weak flame. Takes forever to burn even the smallest weeds. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: D. Van

product_meta.title: Flame King YSNPQ810CGA Propane Torch Weed Burner with Integrated Lighter, Silver
feature_bullets: Flame control valve to easily control flame size
Ideal for weed control, ice melting and other outdoor uses
Molded handle for easy grip and comfort
Integrated self-lighting ignition for quick flame
